name: Claude-Code-Everything-You-Need-to-Know (wesammustafa)
description: [项目级] The ultimate all-in-one guide to mastering Claude Code. From setup, prompt engineering, commands, hooks, workflows, automation, and integrations, to MCP servers, tools, and the BMAD method—packed with step-by-step tutorials, real-world examples, and expert strategies to make this the global go-to repo for Claude mastery.。来源: https://github.com/wesammustafa/Claude-Code-Everything-You-Need-to-Know

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
The ultimate all-in-one guide to mastering Claude Code. From setup, prompt engineering, commands, hooks, workflows, automation, and integrations, to MCP servers, tools, and the BMAD method—packed with step-by-step tutorials, real-world examples, and expert strategies to make this the global go-to repo for Claude mastery.

来源: https://github.com/wesammustafa/Claude-Code-Everything-You-Need-to-Know
语言: Python
Stars: 938
